column1: # - All samples are Smart-seq2 single-cell RNA-seq
# - Sample naming convention varies by pilot study
# - Pilot1 pilot: B[number]_[position]_S[number] (various tissues from original pilot)
# - All samples have paired-end reads (R1 and R2)
# - All samples are currently in 'pending' status
# - File sizes range from ~5MB to ~1GB per read file
# - Pilot1 has two subdirectories: Tabula_Sapiens (736 samples) and pilot (7
# - Pilot2 has three batches with different tissue distributions
# - Pilot6 focuses on Liver Kupffer cells
# - Pilot7 has two batches with Spleen
